name: Gaia (itch) (OneSmolDev)
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare Jam 46 - Keep it Alive!

In Gaia, the player takes control of a gardener and must plant various types of seeds to keep the Tree of Life's health up. Over time, different sources of pollution or natural occurrences shift the balance and may either increase or decrease the pollution multiplier, affecting how quickly Gaia's health drops.
